launcher_description: This is the home page for the ingame mod launcher.
launcher_loaded: The mod launcher has loaded successfully!
launcher_please_wait: Please wait while the mod launcher loads.
launcher_please_wait_explanation: We're just getting things ready for you, checking for updates and making sure mods are available.
getting_started: Select the game you want to install mods for via the <0>Mods</0> menu item.
